data.lyric:
[ti:Permission to Dance]
[ar:BTS (防弹少年团)]
[al:Butter / Permission to Dance]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.68]Permission to Dance - BTS (防弹少年团)
[00:00.74]Lyrics by：Ed Sheeran(에드 시런)/Jenna Andrews/Steve Mac/Johnny McDaid
[00:00.82]Composed by：Ed Sheeran(에드 시런)/Jenna Andrews/Steve Mac/Johnny McDaid
[00:00.89]It's the thought of being young
[00:02.75]When your heart's just like a drum
[00:04.66]Beating louder with no way to guard it
[00:06.82]
[00:08.44]When it all seems like it's wrong
[00:10.41]Just sing along to Elton John
[00:12.31]And to that feeling
[00:13.48]We're just getting started
[00:14.64]
[00:16.15]When the nights get colder
[00:18.12]
[00:18.70]And the rhythms got you falling behind
[00:21.84]
[00:23.66]Just dream about that moment
[00:25.78]
[00:26.36]When you look yourself right
[00:28.41]In the eye eye eye
[00:30.49]Then you say
[00:31.41]I wanna dance
[00:32.69]The music's got me going
[00:34.86]Ain't nothing that can stop
[00:36.02]How we move yeah
[00:38.30]
[00:39.02]Let's break our plans
[00:40.08]And live just like we're golden
[00:42.23]And roll in like we're dancing fools
[00:44.92]
[00:47.04]We don't need to worry
[00:49.91]'Cause when we fall we know how to land
[00:52.51]
[00:53.55]Don't need to talk the talk
[00:55.64]Just walk the walk tonight
[00:58.58]
[00:59.39]'Cause we don't need permission to dance
[01:02.25]There's always something
[01:03.11]That's standing in the way
[01:04.78]But if you don't let it faze ya
[01:07.15]You'll know just how to break
[01:08.76]Just keep the right vibe yeah
[01:10.77]'Cause there's no looking back
[01:12.52]There ain't no one to prove
[01:14.71]We don't got this on lock yeah
[01:17.04]
[01:17.81]The wait is over
[01:19.54]
[01:20.70]The time is now so let's do it right
[01:23.23]
[01:25.48]Yeah we'll keep going
[01:27.26]
[01:27.91]And stay up until we see the sunrise
[01:30.92]
[01:31.79]And we'll say
[01:32.82]I wanna dance
[01:33.90]The music's got me going
[01:35.80]Ain't nothing that can stop
[01:37.59]How we move yeah
[01:40.29]Let's break our plans
[01:41.73]And live just like we're golden
[01:43.77]And roll in like we're dancing fools
[01:46.34]
[01:48.66]We don't need to worry
[01:51.18]'Cause when we fall we know how to land
[01:54.69]Don't need to talk the talk
[01:57.06]Just walk the walk tonight
[01:59.89]
[02:00.79]'Cause we don't need permission to dance
[02:03.87]Da na na na na na na
[02:05.63]Da na na na na na na
[02:07.58]Da na na na na na na
[02:09.13]No we don't need permission to dance
[02:11.21]Da na na na na na na
[02:13.02]Da na na na na na na
[02:15.03]Da na na na na na na
[02:16.80]
[02:19.28]Well let me show ya
[02:21.22]
[02:21.97]That we can keep the fire alive
[02:24.75]
[02:26.95]'Cause it's not over
[02:28.65]
[02:29.41]Till it's over say it one more time
[02:33.11]
[02:33.65]Say
[02:34.26]I wanna dance
[02:35.33]The music's got me going
[02:37.66]Ain't nothing that can stop
[02:39.02]How we move yeah
[02:41.00]
[02:41.80]Let's break our plans
[02:43.20]And live just like we're golden
[02:45.02]And roll in like we're dancing fools
[02:47.81]
[02:49.91]We don't need to worry
[02:52.83]'Cause when we fall we know how to land
[02:55.41]
[02:56.42]Don't need to talk the talk
[02:58.55]Just walk the walk tonight
[03:01.61]
[03:02.35]'Cause we don't need permission to dance
